Articles.Content:
I loved playing this game back when dos was a thing still. It would perfectly fit on KSP1 or KSP2. Alien legacy is a space colonization game. It's somewhat simplistic in implementation with a time ticking background story and exploration set in a single solar system(?). If it or similar was adapted to KSP it could add a huge amount of replayability. Not to mention (more) reasons to visit places and explore. Particularly planetary surfaces. Something mostly missing from the current game(s). Outside of the lack of physics(not including the research) it's basically KSP in another genre. But in 2.5d graphics instead of 3d. As far as overall implementation goes.

It could be called, "Kerbal Legacy!"
